LP1.headerTitle: In Morgis you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.

LP2.headerTitle: In Morgis you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.
LP2.headerSubTitle: Morgis is the perfect off-camera complement to your on-camera life. Here, clients will connect with you, chat and love you for your true personality, earning you BIG MONEY just for who you are; and you can link them back to your camsite at any stage.
LP2.suceedSectionTitle: Morgis is all about letting you earn long term, even as passive income while offline:
LP2.suceedSectionSubTitle: with clients showing their love with monthly recurring support and coming together to crowdfund anything you dream of - even when you’re not on site!
LP2.suceedBlockTitle: Best of all. Morgis can work hand in hand with your cam career.
LP2.suceedBlockSubTitle: On Morgis you’ll find new clients everyday, who will be eager to deepen their connection and have fun: tons of new viewers Morgis allows you to link to your cam shows at any stage.
LP2.recipeTitle: Whether you want to continue the cam life, or shift gears, in Morgis you can:
LP2.recipeCard1SubTitle: your audience for the connection they crave.
LP2.recipeCard2SubTitle: your client base with Friends Morgis brings you for free

LP2.recipeCard4SubTitle: here clients will love and pay you because of your personality!

LP3.headerTitle: In Morgis you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.
LP3.headerSubTitle: Morgis is the perfect compliment to your Instagram account, where your followers, pictures, and personality will finally earn you big money.
LP3.profitTitle: The Power of Morgis' Monetization: 4 Complementary Options
LP3.footerText: Earn off your fans and find new ones every day who will pay to connect, chat and will invite you to amazing activities!

LP4.headerTitle: Morgis is a social community where you can chat, connect and have a great time
LP4.headerSubTitle: Morgis is where your communication skills and your career choice are recognized as a talent - and here, others are willing to pay for your online time.
LP4.percentageText: Morgis: the talent platform that showcases your social skills, handles your billing, drives you all the traffic and ensures you receive the majority of the revenue share: 70%!!
LP4.footerText: Earn off your friends and find new ones from all over the world to chat, Connect and have fun online and offline.
